name: Super Sonic RPG
description:
Super Sonic RPG

Adding to the collection of lackluster Sonic RPGs made by fans, and also the one Bioware made for Nintendo DS that wasn't any good, comes Super Sonic RPG! Play as Sonic! Talk to over four different Sonic characters, by which I mean five (including Lightning the Hedgehog, original character do not steal)! Explore a lush, looping landscape made with like five tiles from Sonic Battle! Collect the seven chaos emeralds with absolutely nothing to stop you!
